sentences.english: The study of Marxism-Leninism will arm the intellectuals ideologically.
sentences.chinese: 學習馬列主義將從思想上武裝知識分子。

sentences.english: He's been preparing to open the gate on…Mallet Island.
sentences.chinese: 他正在馬列特島上，準備打開魔界之門。

sentences.english: It is common occurrence that now young teachers lack in accomplishment of Marxism-Leninism.
sentences.chinese: 青年教師缺乏馬列主義修養是一個比較普遍的現象。

sentences.english: Marlen Spindler is the phenomenon of his unique individuality.
sentences.chinese: 馬列德勒是他的獨特個性的現象。

sentences.english: The October Revolution brought Marxism-Leninism to China.
sentences.chinese: 十月革命給中國帶來了馬列主義。

sentences.english: This point has been forcibly expressed also by marxist-leninists.
sentences.chinese: 這一點也已由馬列主義者強有力地表達了出來。

sentences.english: Marlen Spindler ranks among the best Russian painters from the second half of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 馬列德勒名列從20世紀下半葉最好的俄羅斯畫家。

sentences.english: Han Chinese Marxism-Leninism theory of professional and graduate, double-major.
sentences.chinese: 漢族，馬列主義理論專業和中文專業畢業，雙學歷。

sentences.english: Marxist-Leninist philosophy of we, first of Mao, Deng after other people dare not break.
sentences.chinese: 馬列哲學大家，先是毛，後是鄧，其他人不敢突破。

sentences.english: This is far from Marxism-Leninism compared with Confucianism.
sentences.chinese: 這是馬列主義遠遠不能同儒學相比的。

sentences.english: China may claim to be Marxist-Leninist, but it’s really market-Leninist.
sentences.chinese: 中國所奉行的馬列主義，實際上是市場列寧主義。

sentences.english: These Marxist- Leninist principles should be kept in mind and acted on.
sentences.chinese: 這些馬列主義原則應當牢記並貫徹實行。

sentences.english: The slave and his master political back to people, and Go back homeland for Marx and Lenin's Germany!
sentences.chinese: 奴才及其主子還不還政與民，滾回德國馬列祖宗家去。

sentences.english: Secondly analysed the war of resistance against aggression particular period interpretes Ma Lie's book community terms.
sentences.chinese: 其次分析了抗戰時期翻譯馬列著作的社會條件。

sentences.english: Marxism-Leninism can help solve the problem of nationalities throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 在世界上，馬列主義是能夠解決民族問題的。
